body.name: Farberware Countertop Microwave 700 Watts, 0.7 cu ft - Microwave Oven With LED Lighting and Child Lock - Perfect for Apartments and Dorms - Easy Clean Grey Interior, Retro Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 13 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 13 mins
features: CONVENIENT MICROWAVE: Prepare quick and easy meals in a snap with our powerful microwave. It packs 700 of output power and features a range of settings for press-and-go speed.

POWERFUL SETTINGS: This microwave has ten power levels with multi-stage cooking. You can fully customize your cooking with six one-touch options, including popcorn, potato, and pizza. Defrost by weight or by time settings to make quick work of any task.

PERFECT SIZE: Measuring 0.7 cu ft, this microwave is the ideal small-space solution that offers full-sized cooking in a compact space. It features an easy-to-clean interior and exterior and is perfect for the home or office.

ALL YOU NEED: This microwave has a clear LED display with a kitchen timer and clock that lets you easily keep track of time. Easy-to-view interior lighting lets you keep an eye on your dish, and a child safety lock adds additional security.
FARBERWARE: From weeknight favorites to family feasts they'll never forget, Farberware helps today's families craft the meals that make memories and bring everyone together.
body.description: This microwave oven is the ideal size for office break rooms or home kitchens. One-touch cooking programs let you cook six of the most popular food items with the touch of a button. Choose from ten power levels up to 700. The large digital screen has a clock feature and can display a countdown timer in addition to the remaining cook time. The memory function lets you customize and save your favorite settings, and the large door has an easy-grip handle and child-safety lock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our needs
reviews.reviewText: This is smaller than my previous microwave, which is good. It fits perfectly on a rolling kitchen cart with room left to store hot pads beside it. My dishes fit in it just fine. I love having a handle on the door. On my previous microwave, the handle was a push button and it was starting to be very hard to open. I had to lift up on the door to use the button to open it.I put this new one on a piece of non slip kitchen liner since it's lighter weight so now it doesn't move when I open the door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works better than expected. Easy to use. One of my better choices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A fantastic upgrade, but be ready to get a little pushy with some of the buttons
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this during the last Prime days to upgrade a 20 year old 700 watt microwave. It's bigger, more powerful and has more features than the old one for sure. As some have said, the first column of numbers, 1,4 and 7 are a little hard to push. It seems that the sensor for those are a little off center. I'm learning where they are but got used to fumbling a little quickly.That is really the only thing I have any issues with. I am a basic microwave user. I mostly reheat food. Might cook a baked potato now and then, rarely defrost anything. I saw other reviews complaining that serving trays are too big to move inside the microwave and I have to wonder at the size of serving tray these people are using. I have a few large round plates and they fit and spin just fine.Food heats up nicely and evenly. All the options seem to work. Much quieter than my old one. For me, a winner. Would be 5 stars if I didn't have to press '1' a few times to get those last 15 seconds of reheating done...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this little powerful microwave!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small microwave and this one fit the bill! It’s very stylish and looks great on my little shelf. It also has a light inside that comes on when you are cooking. The 700watts of power is plenty! I love that it’s all black and the inside is a dark gun metal grey, looks sharp! Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We wanted something very large and this is exactly that with great settings and works perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My built-in microwave quit heating so I had to get another one. This one is compact. It's big enough for me. I live alone and it does what I need it to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This could have been a very nice microwave
reviews.reviewText: This could have been a very nice microwave. It's nice to look at. Not very noisy at all compared to my old one, very easy to wipe clean. WHAT is up with the key pad? People were not kidding about how ridiculously hard it is to press the buttons on this key pad. What a shame because other then that it's a nice microwave. If you are someone who has trouble with your hands or fingers in anyway this unit would be very hard for you to operate. It's too much trouble to return. So I'll just have to deal with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for the Man Cave. Warms up food like any other microwave. Does the job, no complaints.
